name: Lulu Way
description:
Lulu Way is a room-based puzzle game about Lulu the little astronaut trying to escape space! It features simple gameplay mechanics but with interesting original puzzle designs

  • Lulu moves in anti-clockwise, constantly
  • Lulu can only jump from one block to another block
  • Lulu must make its way to the next room by jumping onto the right blocks, choose your blocks carefully!


*** 50 amazing hand-crafted levels await you, help Lulu out! ***


Lulu running in circles while you plan your next jump


Lulu making a daring jump from one block to another


Lulu collects a key!


Lulu makes a U-turn!


Lulu gets eaten by Glooby the red monster
